item.title: How to buy domain name?
item.description: Buying domain name is the first step towards website creation. Domain name consist of nameofdomain.tld domain name you can choose any domain name and tld is .com , .net , .website , .ninga , .org , .in , .pk , .it , .net.in , .org.in and many others. For buying domain you can go for these domain registrar . All registrar offers different prices for same domain . Once you register domain with any of these registrar your domain would be locked against your name and will remain with you till expiration .
